invalidRequest: Invalid request. Please check your input.
noPermission: You do not have permission to perform this action.
resourceNotFound: The requested resource was not found.
conflictOccurred: A conflict occurred. This resource may already exist.
validationFailed: Validation failed. Please check your input.
tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.
serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
serviceUnavailable: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
networkError: Unable to connect to server. Please check your internet connection and ensure the backend server is running.
timeoutError: Request timed out. Please try again.
connectionRefused: Connection refused. Please ensure the backend server is running on the correct port.
serverNotFound: Server not found. Please check the server address.
